website_summaries.verdict: It's pricey, but this is a good broad-spectrum dog dewormer that can tackle just about any type of worm.
pros: Treats tapeworms, roundworms, hookworms and whipworms
Powerful chewable treatment that gives results in 1 or 2 days
cons: Expensive, especially considering you get 1-to-2 treatments per box

customer_reviews.title: Actual dosage: 45-60 lbs, 1 tablet. 61-90 ...
customer_reviews.text: Actual dosage: 45-60 lbs, 1 tablet. 61-90 pounds, 1.5 tablets. 91-120 lbs, 2 tablets. I didn't realize this, and had to buy 2 more boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carr

customer_reviews.title: Don't make any f!@#ing plans
customer_reviews.text: I gave my dogs this and it definitely works. However, I gave it to them in the morning and then supervised them most of the day, took them for a walk, etc. After about 6 hours, I had to leave for work. I came home on lunch 4 hours later, and it was like the poopocalypse in my house. I should have put my dogs in a crate that day, because I came home to my carpet being virtually destroyed by diarrhea. Like I said, the product works, but it will run through them and cause an extreme voiding.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schlieter

customer_reviews.title: Better than Vets' standard treatment
customer_reviews.text: Works as good or better than Drontal Plus that costs much more at vet. It is the same formulation as Drontal+ so save yourself the hassle of a flotation test ($20+) and two rounds of Drontal+ $60, & not to mention vet service charge, and treat your own dog for worms. I spent $300 with vet trying to get rid of tapeworms , switched to this and my dig is finally cured after 3 months going to vet! Go figure!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Petrie

customer_reviews.title: It does really work
customer_reviews.text: So this dewormer really does the trick. If you have more than one dog, you really should treat them all. We needed it when we bought our home, the previous owner had outside cats and our dogs at the poop in the yard (So Gross). Once we solved that problem our dog did not get worms anymore. But this product really worked. It is really important to take your dog to the vet if the worms do not go away using this.
customer_reviews.author: maggiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Great wormer at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent broad spectrum wormer for dogs at a great price. Bought a box for my almost 2 year old Lab/Pit mix. As long as the great pricing stays the same, I will definitely be buying more. Everyone else wants like $50 a box, which is quite expensive for 2 pills(1 dose). If I wanted to pay that much, I'd just purchase worm medicine from my Veterinarian.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Chop into small pieces to make the medicin go down
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not feel inclined to munch on the chew-able medicine which looked like a cute little bone. When I chopped each bone however into 8 pieces and covered the small pieces with a little creamy peanut butter she was quite happy to swallow the pieces without a fuss. The bones cut easily. For my 80 pound puppy, I used 1 and 1/2 bone (there are 2 bones in the box to allow for size variations). It worked by the next day and she's comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: Heike Childs

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Did the job and took care of the tape worms. She didn't like to eat them plain,but when I mixed them in with her other food they disappeared easily. (She's a VERY picky dog who can actually pick out the kibble she doesn't like and leave them in the bowl!)
customer_reviews.author: Dogonets

customer_reviews.title: No more worms! Weight gain is now possible!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! My shelter adoptions are worm free! Arrived before scheduled date in tact! I make one of My dogs an organic peanut butter sandwich with the pill in It! The others eat their pills happily! Thank You Bayer!
customer_reviews.author: Earthly Color Brown

customer_reviews.title: It got rid of the worms but gave my dog ...
customer_reviews.text: It got rid of the worms but gave my dog severe diarrhea for three days. He pooped all in the house when he normally doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described. Worms in poop disappeared in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Carlex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally cleared my rescued 90+ lb giant of worms without upsetting his stomach
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Hopwood

customer_reviews.title: Sent an empty box:((((
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1 pkg for small & 3 pkgs for large dogs, received the pkgs but only two large dogs contained any product . All boxes are just about flattened as fit they were stepped on. I checked to make sure to tabs didn’t end up in another box -they didn’t. So now I’ll have to order another box -as if they weren’t expensive enough... disappointed esp since they had to reschedule the delivery date by several days.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Pireaux

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Been dealing with the vet for 2 yrs and several different types of products. I think we finally got rid of the hook worms because my dog has triple the energy.
customer_reviews.author: smartypants

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as advertised. I broke the indicated amount into half of my dog's normal breakfast and monitored him throughout the day. For him, no side effects or stomach discomfort noted and the tapeworms were gone immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Do you homework and these will save you a ton of money. Vet visit and these very same pills will cost you up to 40% more.
customer_reviews.author: ShepLady

customer_reviews.title: Product worked great!!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great!!! And customer service outstanding, good price and I've got my product before time. Thank you very much☺
customer_reviews.author: vera

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Well this was for my dog so of course they give me a little trouble taking but this stuff works well
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen any works since we treated her! She's slowly putting weight back on :)
customer_reviews.author: Bn

customer_reviews.title: Worked in a few hours!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a glutton when it comes to anything but spit this out instantly. Expect to grind it into something. That doesn't require deducting a star in my opinion. Within 3 to 4 hours this product started working and my puppy has been worm free since. Be careful after your dog consumes this; they will soon have a horrifying bowel movement.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent broad spectrum worker. I saw a difference in our dogs right away.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Streit

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Use this once or twice a year. Fur babies never seem to have a problem. We live in the country.
customer_reviews.author: Strshine

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect on my dog. This helped save us an expensive vet visit. She was pooping dead tapeworms the next morning after taking the pill.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Tischer

customer_reviews.title: Great gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: Got the job done on my Mastiff 120 pounds after a second dose (just to make sure) Follow the directions. Will buy again if needed
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cane corso this worked within hours and they are completely gone it seems after just 3 treats !
customer_reviews.author: alexus

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my dog. Eliminated his worms with 1 pill. Definitely would recommend. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy and so far we see a enprovement in our dog for the better
customer_reviews.author: granma

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job well.
customer_reviews.text: Two thumbs up for affordable quality medication for your pet. This medicine does exactly what it describes on the box. What's even better, is there's no expensive trip to the vet or a need for a prescription.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but I guess it doesn't taste great
customer_reviews.text: This dewormer worked in one dose! The only problem was that my dog didn't want to eat it, so I mixed it with grilled chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Works and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I worm my dogs every year and use this dewormer. Works well and easy to use. I have not seen any adverse effects from using it.
customer_reviews.author: big red

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this several times now and it works extremely well, highly recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Cousins

customer_reviews.title: Worms are gone!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after reading reviews that this would work as well as people claimed...but I'm glad I was wrong! Worms were GONE the day after treatment
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! I was a bit afraid since my dog ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! I was a bit afraid since my dog is 13 yrs old and is on thyroid medication daily. No terrible side effects and got rid of her worm problem.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Huckins

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The best stuff over the counter by a long shot
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and a fraction of the cost in the local pet store!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: My wife gave this to our dog the other day ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave this to our dog the other day. He ate it with no trouble. He seems to be doing well!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for me...
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate the first one and immediately threw up his supper.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarRebel

customer_reviews.title: ALAS
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I mixed it with a meal and she wouldn't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: DOC

customer_reviews.title: Momma bear ate them with no problem .
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use my rottweiler had no problem chewing the 2 crunchy biscuit like medication.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbows and kids

customer_reviews.title: EPMTY BOX
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it off amazon and it arrived today and nothing was inside. Not pills or instructions or anything. Just an empty green dewormer box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Happen
customer_reviews.text: It must be something else. My Labrador is still rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Larry N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and the delivery time was within the delivery time frame given. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: S LeCren

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and worked great! I deworm all my dogs every six months and this was a great deal for the quantity I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Over the counter wormer closest to Vet Rx
customer_reviews.text: I have researched ingredients in wormers and this has the best 3 ingredients to kill 4 types of worms,tape,hook,round,and whip.Tablet was a little big but hid it in Bailey's goodies and got it in him,it did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Iam very pleased with my purchase. I bought the dewormer for large dogs and my Lab ate both pills right out of the packaging. The next day the tapeworms appeared gone. It has been several days now and his stool still seems clean and parasite free. Iam relieved, happy and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: amy massey

customer_reviews.title: ... up before it was suppose to so that was great. My dog loved them
customer_reviews.text: The product showed up before it was suppose to so that was great. My dog loved them. I had no problems what so ever. I'd definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very Fast Shipping and Great Customer Service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Terri C

customer_reviews.title: Quick service!
customer_reviews.text: My order was filled quickly. I thank you and Murphy (our dog) thanks you. Recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog took it just fine when mixed in his food
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and the price was reasonable. Purchased this based on the positive reviews. My vet was going to charge $66 for one treatment. Treated my dog and 3 cats for less using this brand. My dog took it just fine when mixed in his food. So far, it seems to have done the job. Only gave 4 stars because, poisons! I try to avoid these products, but had no choice. Wish a more natural option was available.
customer_reviews.author: KAROL

customer_reviews.title: What I like about this product is it's a one-dose treatment
customer_reviews.text: My dog turned up her nose at it and wouldn't eat it, so I had to crush it and mix it with some crushed treats to get her to eat it. What I like about this product is it's a one-dose treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Randall G. Neighbour

customer_reviews.title: Product satisfaction!
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what my dog needed. I knew she had tape worms, the Quad Dewormer took care of her issue with one dose. Directions were easy to follow too.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Roth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did the job in does. Will not mess with the affects while using with Sentinel flea/heartworm.
customer_reviews.author: TEXASMEL

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but was shipped from another country. I was surprised to have to sign at the post office.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: ... a bayer product and they seem to do a great job with no diarrhea are no mess and most ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've used a bayer product and they seem to do a great job with no diarrhea are no mess and most importantly they get rid of the worms I would recommend this Bret
customer_reviews.author: bret knox

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My great pyrenees would not readily take ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My great pyrenees would not readily take the pill so had to be in thesepill treats. The pills are large and had to use multiple pill treats to hide the pill but easily did the trick. Even had one of the pills fall out as he was crunching them but the flavor and smell from the pill treat had enough effect that he scooped the pill right back up and ate it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping:
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8-year-old 95-100lb dog. I attempted to treat her numerous times with the powders; that didn't work. I took her to the vet to get tested / get shots (again, multiple times); that didn't work. I purchased this hoping it would go easy on her stomach and get the job done. I can't review the actual product itself as I've just used it and we're waiting on the results. The shipping was very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Fianna

customer_reviews.title: Not a preventive
customer_reviews.text: Should say it's not a preventative med. When I called them they said to go to the vet. If I wanted to do that I wouldn't have bought it here. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Moss

customer_reviews.title: Worked excellent for ridding my animals of tummy issues
customer_reviews.text: We got a new puppy and a few weeks later my other 2 dogs seemed to have stomach issues. Although the puppy had previously been dewormed, we suspected a worm issue that had been spread between the 3 of them. Within a couple of days, all seemed to be better. No issues since.
customer_reviews.author: azsherm80

product_meta.title: Bayer Animal Health Quad Dewormer for Large Dogs (Over 45 lbs) 2 Chewable Tablets
product_meta.description:
Quad Dewormer Chewable Tablets for Large Dogs by Bayer will remove the common tapeworms, Dipylidium caninum and Taenia pisiformis, remove common hookworms, Ancylostoma caninum and Uncinaria stenocephala, remove common roundworms, Toxocara canis and Toxascaris leonina, and remove whipworms, Trichuris vulpis in dogs. 

Broad Spectrum Chewable Anthelmintic Dewormer for Medium Sized Dogs (45 lbs and greater)
Box contains 2 Chewable Tablets
